RT by @wasei_jj: 『Cyberia Layer_2』のＣＤジャケットの為に安倍吉俊氏が描き下ろしたイラストと98年当時発売された『cyberia Mix』のイラストをMIX。袖に『lain』『JJ』『タロウ』と並んだ胸熱なロンT。 両袖に異なるコラージュがデザインされた一枚！
#CLX_lain #serialexperimentslain #メッサストア #lain

entry.title: R to @wasei_jj: 開始2時間。名曲誕生の予感。 Two hours later. The birth of a masterpiece!
entry.summary: 開始2時間。名曲誕生の予感。 Two hours later. The birth of a masterpiece!

entry.title: R to @wasei_jj: I am going to write a song called "Good Night Navi" inspired by words of lain. The Ableton Live screen is currently a score with no notes, so I'm going to set the BPM to 110 and draw a 16-bar sketch. If all goes well, I will expand it to about 5 minutes. #CyberiaLayer4
entry.summary: I am going to write a song called "Good Night Navi" inspired by words of lain. The Ableton Live screen is currently a score with no notes, so I'm going to set the BPM to 110 and draw a 16-bar sketch. If all goes well, I will expand it to about 5 minutes. #CyberiaLayer4

entry.title: 『Good Night Navi（仮）』という曲をこれから作る。題名ありき。「おやすみナビ」。Naviを閉じる玲音の安らぎと不安を美しく表現できないか。Ablton Liveの画面は今音符のない楽譜。BPMを仮に110に設定しまず16小節のデッサンを描く。上手くいけばそれを5分ほどに膨らませていく作業。 #CyberiaLayer4
entry.summary: 『Good Night Navi（仮）』という曲をこれから作る。題名ありき。「おやすみナビ」。Naviを閉じる玲音の安らぎと不安を美しく表現できないか。Ablton Liveの画面は今音符のない楽譜。BPMを仮に110に設定しまず16小節のデッサンを描く。上手くいけばそれを5分ほどに膨らませていく作業。 #CyberiaLayer4

entry.title: R to @wasei_jj: When I first started streaming, I asked for 1,000 subscribers to get my phone live on YouTube. I called out to everyone to subscribe 1000 people for the first time! Three years later, I never thought I would be doing this with VRC involved. 4,000 subscribers, thank you 😊.
entry.summary: When I first started streaming, I asked for 1,000 subscribers to get my phone live on YouTube. I called out to everyone to subscribe 1000 people for the first time! Three years later, I never thought I would be doing this with VRC involved. 4,000 subscribers, thank you 😊.
